wikipedia_page.main: Heather Cameron is a Canadian and British social theorist and social entrepreneur. She is the Michael B. Kaufman Professor of Practice in Social Entrepreneurship and Innovation at the Brown School at Washington University in St. Louis. From 2008 to 2016 she was a Junior Professor of Physical Activity, Inclusion and Sport at the Department of Education and Psychology at the Free University of Berlin and Professor Extraordinarius at the University of the Western Cape, South Africa.

response: * Lifeguard (comics), a Marvel Comics superhero, with the alter ego Heather Cameron
* Heather Cameron (professor), Canadian and British social theorist and social entrepreneur
